entities.name: harry

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin who is whimping and trying to tell their father.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Dudley's father, mentioned by Dudley in his whimpering.

entities.name: alleyway

relationships.description: Harry and Dudley are interacting with each other.
Harry is mentioned by Dudley in his whimpering, but there's no direct interaction between Harry and Dad.
Harry is present in Little Whinging.
Something is present in the alleyway, which Harry can sense.
